title: Combine Deep Dive/Awards with Chris Trapasso and Franchise Tags with Joel Corry (Football 03/07)
description:
Will Brinson hosts the Pick Six podcast with guests Joel Corry and Chris Trapasso. Will and CBS Sports Senior Contract Advisor and former sports agent Joel Corry discuss the impact of the franchise tags that were and weren't handed out, with focus on Le'Veon Bell, Allen Robinson, Sammy Watkins and Kirk Cousins. Then, CBS NFL Draft Writer Chris Trapasso joins the pod to break down winners and losers from the NFL Combine, while handing out awards for various Combine performances.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
